/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a striking view of a highway overpass in Beijing, China. The overpass, a modern marvel of concrete and steel, curves gracefully against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. It stands as a testament to human ingenuity, providing a path above the bustling traffic below. The perspective of the image is from the ground, looking up at the overpass, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the structure. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature's majesty to the urban landscape.
